Reviews.Title: Good price and great product
Reviews.Author: A kim
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 8-year old. He absolutely loves it.He has downloaded many games on it. I have also played the games with him on this tablet and I think this is a very nicely built tablet at a amazingly low price. The WI-FI works good and the screen is responsive. This tablet is perfect for kids and also very good for elderly who wants to stay in touch with their grandkids. As an adult, I will probably go with Ipad as I can afford it but if you are looking for a good device to browse internet, or as a second device, this is awesome. I would recommend this tablet.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fastest Quad Core processor. Better Looks and Build
At a fraction of the cost of an ipad or other tablets, it gives best value for money.
Browse internet via WiFi without paying any 3G charges
A large number of FREE games can be downloaded from Google Play
Enjoy movies on YouTube and it also supports streaming via NetFlix
ProductInfo.Name: Simbans (TM) S81G 8 Inch Quad Core Tablet PC - IPS Screen, 1 GB RAM, 8GB, Android 4.1, 1.2Ghtz , WiFi, Camera, G Sensor, YouTube, Skype - GREY
